mapper.update: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.mobilePayment.impl.RequestFundTransferMapper.updateApprovePAY0296D] 20191222 - KR JAEMAJEM */ UPDATE PAY0296D A --Mobile Request Fund Transfer SET A.NEW_ORD_OUT_AMT = #{newOrdOutAmt} --New Order Outstanding Amount , A.ADV_AMT = #{advAmt} --Advanced Amount , A.ADV_MONTH = #{advMonth} --Advanced Month , A.UPD_DT = SYSDATE --Update Date , A.UPD_USER_ID = #{updUserId} --Update User Id WHERE A.FT_REQ_ID = #{ftReqId} --Mobile Request Fund Transfer Number AND A.FT_STUS_ID = 1 --Fund Tranfer Status
